title: Rapid KL F.C.
text:
Rapid Kuala Lumpur FC (often shortened to Rapid KL F.C.) is a <a href="Malaysia">Malaysia</a>n <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club based in <a href="Kuala%20Lumpur">Kuala Lumpur</a>. The club represents the <a href="Rapid%20KL">Rapid KL</a>, the transportations company in Malaysia football. The club entered the <a href="Malaysia%20FAM%20League">Malaysia FAM League</a> in 2011 and got 5th place. The club also hold the biggest record of winning the match with 7-1 against <a href="Melodi%20Jaya%20Sports%20Club">Melodi Jaya Sports Club</a>. Unfortunately, the club decided to pull out from 2012 season due to financial difficulties. The club is participating in <a href="KLFA%20Division%201%20League">KLFA Division 1 League</a> since 2014.
Sponsorship.
For season running from 2014, <a href="Rapid%20KL">Rapid KL</a> was club's first shirt sponsor. The manufacturer was <a href="Lotto%20Sport%20Italia">Lotto</a>.
